Content.title: Content
Content.description: Represents any piece of content in the application, such as a level, semester, subject, folder, or file.

id.description: Unique identifier for the content item.

name.description: Display name of the content item.

parentId.description: The ID of the parent item. Null for top-level items.

order.description: The order of the item within its parent.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the item was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the item was last updated.

iconName.description: Name of the Lucide icon for subjects.

color.description: Tailwind color class for subject icons.

storagePath.description: Path to the file in Firebase Cloud Storage.

sourceFileId.description: The ID of the original source file for generated content.

quizData.description: JSON string containing the data for an interactive quiz.

isHidden.description: Whether the content is hidden from non-admins.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile information, including their role.

studentId.description: The user's verified university student ID.

QuestionSet.title: Question Set
QuestionSet.description: Represents a set of questions generated by the AI.

id.description: Unique identifier for the question set.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this set.

fileName.description: The name of the source file for the questions.

textQuestions.description: The questions in plain text format.

textExam.description: The exam questions in plain text format.

jsonExam.description: The exam questions in JSON format.

textFlashcard.description: The flashcard questions in plain text format.

jsonFlashcard.description: The flashcard questions in JSON format.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the set was created.

sourceFileId.description: The ID of the original source file.

order.description: The display order of the question set.

ClaimedStudentId.title: Claimed Student ID
ClaimedStudentId.description: A record to show that a student ID has been claimed by a user.

userId.description: The UID of the user who claimed this ID.

claimedAt.description: Timestamp when the ID was claimed.

/content/{contentId}.description: Stores all content items in a flat structure.

/claimedStudentIds/{studentId}.description: Stores a record of student IDs that have been linked to an account to ensure uniqueness.
